group_1.textRight: And that wraps it up for our next mission details.

group_1.textLeft: Is that all clear, everyone?
This mission might be one of the more physically@demanding ones, but still, I would like you all to do@your be—...
Mifuyu?!

group_1.textCenter: Could you let me take part in this mission, please?

group_1.textLeft: Hm, why? You're a high-ranking executive, though?
It makes no sense for a top brass like you to@suddenly take on one of the frontline jobs,@don't you think?
Exactly! We don't want to put such a burden on@Mifuyu either...
This operation might be a little out of your field,@Mifuyu~

group_1.textRight: We're short on hands in that location, so I don't@mind. You're the first person who requested@themselves to be assigned there, though.
I, too, am mystified as to why you would ask@for such a thing.
Not only is it an unsuitable task for you, as others@have said already.
But above all else, I'm concerned for your@body health.
You must be exhausted after working as a model@for Alina's swimsuit drawing practice.

group_1.textCenter: Ah! W-well, I can't say you're wrong, b-but, um...

group_1.textLeft: Gone? Whatever do you mean?

group_1.textCenter: Asking me to model in a swimsuit on such short@notice...
Of course, I had to rush to get one, but...
I'm glad I still have the one I bought@three years ago♪
I've noticeably grown since then, but it still@fits me to a T.

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu! Are you done changing yet?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm all good now!
Please make the drawing beautiful, seeing as I went@as far as to put on a swimsuit and all.
Do you have any pose requests?
Although I can't do anything too crazy...

group_1.textRight: Nevermind, I'm not feeling it after all...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100650:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Why not...?
Did I say something off-putting just now?

group_1.textRight: It's because the perfect body is dead.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...? Wh-what does that mean?
"The perfect body is dead"...?
Her words are a complete riddle...
[chara:100650:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]No way! No, this can't be...
This swimsuit definitely feels tighter on me than@before, I noticed that much, but!
It's only par for the course considering I bought it@three years ago.
My body simply matured a lot in these three years.
Simply matured... a lot...
[chara:100650:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]No, there's no denying it, I really did gain weight...

group_1.narration: To be honest,@it's not as if I was completely unaware of this truth,@but I didn't want to admit it to myself.
I mean, I've been leading the same lifestyle@all these years then and now,@therefore my body shape should also be the same.
​I was wrong to assume that.@Not changing my lifestyle was a mistake.
​No longer can I let myself stuff my stomach@with sweets and go to bed like I used to.
​My age no longer allows me@to do so without consequences.

group_1.textLeft: Please! I want to exercise!

group_1.textRight: I get how you feel, but...
Using a Magius mission as a substitute for@a proper diet is a little...

group_1.textLeft: I can't keep going like this, just ordering others@around while chewing on manju!
My body isn't structured like your youthful bodies!

group_1.textCenter: I need to move a lot! Until summer comes!@I must lose weight until summer!
Well then, try your hardest.@I'm expecting some nice results.
